leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-性质预测与材料信息学生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 数据库 + 模型库 + benchmark

queries: [WEB] uncertainty quantification in materials science github
[WEB] explainable machine learning for chemistry github
[WEB] conformal prediction for molecular properties github
[WEB] graph neural network interpretability materials github
[WEB] bayesian optimization for materials design github

tools.name: Bgolearn
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian global optimization framework for materials design
tools.detailed_description: Bgolearn is a Python package for Bayesian global optimization, specifically designed for materials discovery and design. It provides an efficient framework for finding optimal material compositions or processing parameters with uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: DeepMol
tools.one_line_profile: Machine and Deep Learning Framework for Computational Chemistry
tools.detailed_description: DeepMol is a Python framework that simplifies the machine learning pipeline for drug discovery and computational chemistry. It offers tools for data processing, feature engineering, model training (including deep learning), and hyperparameter optimization.

tools.name: conformalpredictor
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal prediction for machine learning accelerated docking screens
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing conformal prediction frameworks to calibrate machine learning models used in virtual screening and docking. It provides statistically valid confidence intervals for predictions, enhancing the reliability of drug discovery pipelines.

tools.name: Emukit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for decision making and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: Emukit is a highly adaptable Python toolkit for enriching decision-making processes with uncertainty quantification. It supports multi-fidelity modeling, Bayesian optimization, experimental design, and sensitivity analysis, applicable to various scientific simulation tasks.

tools.name: astartes
tools.one_line_profile: Rigorous data splitting and sampling for scientific machine learning
tools.detailed_description: astartes is a Python package designed to provide rigorous and reproducible data splitting and sampling algorithms for chemical and materials science datasets. It addresses the challenge of out-of-distribution generalization by offering various structural and property-based splitting methods.

tools.name: DeepDelta
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise deep learning for molecular property difference prediction
tools.detailed_description: DeepDelta is a deep learning approach based on Chemprop that predicts the difference in properties between two molecules (delta learning). It is particularly useful for optimization tasks where the relative improvement between molecular analogs is of interest.

tools.name: UQpy
tools.one_line_profile: General purpose toolbox for uncertainty quantification in physical systems
tools.detailed_description: UQpy (Uncertainty Quantification with python) is a comprehensive toolbox for modeling uncertainty in physical and mathematical systems. It includes modules for uncertainty propagation, reliability analysis, stochastic process generation, and inference.

tools.name: PolymerAssembler
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for constructing atomistic 3D polymer models for MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool designed for the quick construction of atomistic 3D polymer models based on a probabilistic Markov model, facilitating molecular mechanics force field simulations.

tools.name: MUBen
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for uncertainty quantification in molecular representation models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool designed to evaluate the uncertainty quantification capabilities of various molecular representation models, aiding in the development of reliable AI4Science models.

tools.name: chemprop (UQ fork)
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction with fast uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A version of Chemprop focused on fast and scalable uncertainty quantification for neural molecular property prediction, enabling guided virtual screening and accelerated optimization.

tools.name: dionysus
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tool for calibration and generalizability of probabilistic molecular models
tools.detailed_description: A library for analyzing the calibration, performance, and generalizability of probabilistic models, specifically tailored for small molecular datasets in materials informatics.

tools.name: WebPlotDigitizer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to extract numerical data from plot images
tools.detailed_description: A computer vision assisted tool widely used in scientific research to extract underlying numerical data from images of plots, charts, and graphs found in publications.

tools.name: OpenGeoSysUncertaintyQuantification.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification toolbox for OpenGeoSys 6
tools.detailed_description: A Julia-based toolbox designed to perform uncertainty quantification specifically for OpenGeoSys 6 simulations, aiding in geological and hydrological modeling.

tools.name: chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Message Passing Neural Networks for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A standard library for training Message Passing Neural Networks (MPNNs) for molecular property prediction, widely used in cheminformatics and materials science.

tools.name: chemprop-contrib
tools.one_line_profile: Community extensions for Chemprop
tools.detailed_description: A collection of community-contributed extensions and additional features for the Chemprop machine learning package.

tools.name: GrainLearning
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian uncertainty quantification toolbox for granular materials modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian uncertainty quantification toolbox designed for discrete and continuum models of granular materials, facilitating parameter estimation and model validation.

tools.name: OpenCossan
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for uncertainty quantification and management
tools.detailed_description: An open and free toolbox for uncertainty quantification, reliability analysis, and risk management, offering advanced algorithms for simulation and sensitivity analysis.

tools.name: DeepChem
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for drug discovery, materials science, and quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning library that provides high-quality tools for drug discovery, materials science, quantum chemistry, and biology, featuring a wide range of molecular featurizers and models.

tools.name: DIG
tools.one_line_profile: Library for graph deep learning research with interpretability focus
tools.detailed_description: Dive into Graphs (DIG) is a library for graph deep learning research, providing unified implementations for graph generation, self-supervised learning, and interpretability (explainability) of GNNs.

tools.name: graphpatch
tools.one_line_profile: Library for activation patching on PyTorch neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing activation patching (causal tracing) on PyTorch models to interpret model behavior and internal representations.

tools.name: DimeNet
tools.one_line_profile: Directional Message Passing for Molecular Graphs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DimeNet and DimeNet++ models for molecular property prediction, utilizing directional message passing to capture 3D structural information.

tools.name: matminer
tools.one_line_profile: Data mining and feature extraction for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library for data mining in materials science, providing tools to retrieve data from various databases and extract complex features (descriptors) from materials structures and compositions.

tools.name: pyg_chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch Geometric implementation of ChemProp
tools.detailed_description: A concise and customizable reimplementation of the ChemProp message passing neural network using PyTorch Geometric, facilitating molecular property prediction.

tools.name: chaospy
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for uncertainty quantification using polynomial chaos expansions
tools.detailed_description: A numerical toolbox for performing uncertainty quantification using polynomial chaos expansions and Monte Carlo integration methods.

tools.name: Robert
tools.one_line_profile: Automated machine learning protocols for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automated machine learning in chemistry that streamlines the process from descriptors or SMILES to publication-quality results.

tools.name: GEOM
tools.one_line_profile: Energy-annotated molecular conformations dataset and utilities
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset of molecular conformations with energy annotations, essential for training machine learning models in chemistry and materials science to predict 3D structures and energetic properties.

tools.name: Gauche
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Process library for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A library designed for applying Gaussian Processes to chemical data, providing uncertainty quantification and interpretability for molecular property predictions.

tools.name: RL-GraphINVENT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based molecular generation platform using RL
tools.detailed_description: A platform for graph-based targeted molecular generation using graph neural networks and reinforcement learning, designed to probabilistically generate new molecules with desired property profiles.

tools.name: PyTorch Geometric
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network Library for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning extension library for PyTorch, widely used in scientific domains for modeling molecular graphs, crystal structures, and other structured scientific data.

tools.name: pygpc
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity and uncertainty analysis toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for sensitivity and uncertainty analysis based on Generalized Polynomial Chaos (gPC), enabling efficient quantification of uncertainties in scientific models and simulations.

tools.name: ChemBench
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular benchmark datasets and utilities
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing benchmark datasets (MoleculeNet, MolMapNet) and utilities for evaluating molecular property prediction models, facilitating standardized comparison of algorithms.

tools.name: Uncertainpy
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis toolbox for computational neuroscience
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox tailored for performing uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis on computational neuroscience models, enabling the analysis of how model parameters affect outputs.

tools.name: Smart-UQ
tools.one_line_profile: C++ toolbox for uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed for uncertainty quantification tasks, developed by the Advanced Composites Group at the University of Strathclyde.

tools.name: ADMET-AI
tools.one_line_profile: ADMET property prediction using Chemprop models
tools.detailed_description: A tool providing training and prediction scripts for Chemprop models specifically trained on ADMET (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion, and Toxicity) datasets for drug discovery.

tools.name: Tridesclous
tools.one_line_profile: Offline and online spike sorting toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for spike sorting of extracellular recordings, offering both offline and online processing capabilities for neuroscience research.

tools.name: CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks for materials
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks (CGCNN) for predicting material properties directly from the crystal structure.

tools.name: Uncertainty Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for predictive uncertainty quantification and calibration
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed for predictive uncertainty quantification, providing methods for calibration, metrics calculation, and visualization of uncertainty in machine learning models.

tools.name: OptBayesExpt
tools.one_line_profile: Optimal Bayesian Experiment Design package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for Optimal Bayesian Experiment Design, facilitating adaptive experimentation and efficient data acquisition in scientific experiments.

tools.name: LibBEEF
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Error Estimation Functionals library for DFT
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Bayesian Error Estimation Functionals (BEEF) for use in density functional theory (DFT) codes to estimate computational errors.

tools.name: InvDesFlow-AL
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning framework for inverse materials design
tools.detailed_description: An active learning-based generative framework for inverse materials design that iteratively optimizes material generation towards desired properties.
